author: Special Correspondent
text:
Ahead of the release of results of the semester exams held in November/December 2015, Anna University has created a smart phone app to access the results by keying in the candidates’ registration number and date of birth.

“We tried the app route for students as they complained that even two days after uploading the results on the website they were unable to view it. The app would enable the candidates to access the results as soon as they are released,” said G. Uma, Controller of Examinations. According to her, an app was created last semester and the response to it was encouraging and hence they chose to continue with it.

Prof. Uma said the results would be declared on Saturday.

The semester exams for which the results are being declared on Saturday was fraught with uncertainties with students from the four flood-affected districts – Chennai, Tiruvallur, Kancheepuram and Cuddalore - demanding that the exams be postponed by at least a month or that they be allowed to take the exams the next semester.
title: University app to view results
